credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Leningrad 1935
description: Cup cylindrical, rounded at base, loop handle; painted on front in poly- chrome enamels with picture of the Peter and Paul Fortress and Kirovsky (Troitsky) Bridge over Neva River, back has gilded image of Egyptian sphinx from Embankment at University Wharf. Saucer has gilded ribbon border around outer edge.
name: Cup and saucer
